name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _[SOUND] So

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _looking at the text mining problem more closely
column6: we see that the problem is _

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _similar to general data mining
column6: except that we'll be focusing more on text data. _

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: And we're going to have text mining algorithms to help us to turn text data

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _into actionable knowledge that we can use in real world

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _especially for decision making

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: for completing whatever tasks that require text data to support.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _Because
column7: in many real world problems of data mining _

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: we also tend to have other kinds of data that are non-textual.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: So a more general picture would be to include non-text data as well.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: And for this reason we might be concerned with joint mining of text and

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: non-text data.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _And so in this course we're going to focus more on text mining

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: but we're also going to also touch how do to joint analysis of both text data and

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: non-text data.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: With this problem definition we can now look at the landscape of

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: the topics in text mining and analytics.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: Now this slide shows the process of generating text data in more detail.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _More specifically

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: human observer would look at the word from some perspective.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: Different people would be looking at the world from different angles and

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: they'll pay attention to different things.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: The same person at different times might also pay attention to different aspects

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: of the observed world.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: And so the humans are able to perceive the world from some perspective.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _And that human
column7: would then form a view of the world. _

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: And that can be called the Observed World.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _Of course
column6: this would be different from the Real World because of the perspective _

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: that the person has taken can often be biased also.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _Now the Observed World can be represented as

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _entity-relation graphs or in a more general way

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: using knowledge representation language.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _But in general
column6: this is basically what a person has in mind about the world. _

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _And we don't really know what exactly it looks like

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: But then the human would express what the person has

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _observed using a natural language

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: And the result is text data.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: Of course a person could have used a different language to express what he or

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: she has observed.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: In that case we might have text data of mixed languages or different languages.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: The main goal of text mining Is actually to revert this

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: process of generating text data.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: We hope to be able to uncover some aspect in this process.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _Specifically

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _And that means by looking at text data in English
column6: we may be able to discover _

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _something about English

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _So this is one type of mining problems

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: some knowledge about language which may be useful in various ways.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _If you look at the picture

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: we can also then mine knowledge about the observed world.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: And so this has much to do with mining the content of text data.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _We're going to look at what the text data are about

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: get the essence of it or extracting high quality information

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: about a particular aspect of the world that we're interested in.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _For example
column6: everything that has been said about a particular person or _

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: a particular entity.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: And this can be regarded as mining content

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: to describe the observed world in the user's mind or the person's mind.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _If you look further

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _we can mine knowledge about this observer

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: So this has also to do with using text data to infer

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: some properties of this person.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: And these properties could include the mood of the person or

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: sentiment of the person.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: And note that we distinguish the observed word from the person

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: because text data can't describe what the person has observed in an objective way.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _But the description can be also subjected with sentiment and so

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _in general
column6: you can imagine the text data would contain some factual _

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: descriptions of the world plus some subjective comments.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: So that's why it's also possible to

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: do text mining to mine knowledge about the observer.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _Finally
column6: if you look at the picture to the left side of this picture

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: then you can see we can certainly also say something about the real world.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: Right?

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: So indeed we can do text mining to infer other real world variables.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: And this is often called a predictive analytics.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: And we want to predict the value of certain interesting variable.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _So

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: multiple types of knowledge that we can mine from text in general.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: When we infer other real world variables we

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: could also use some of the results from

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: mining text data as intermediate results to help the prediction.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _For example

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: after we mine the content of text data we might generate some summary of content.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: And that summary could be then used

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: to help us predict the variables of the real world.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _Now of course this is still generated from the original text data

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: but I want to emphasize here that often the processing of text data

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: to generate some features that can help with the prediction is very important.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: And that's why here we show the results of

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _some other mining tasks
column6: including mining the content of text data and _

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _mining knowledge about the observer
column6: can all be very helpful for prediction. _

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _In fact
column7: we could also use the non-text _

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _data to help prediction
column6: and of course it depends on the problem. _

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _In general
column6: non-text data can be very important for such prediction tasks. _

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _For example
column6: if you want to predict stock prices or _

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: changes of stock prices based on discussion in the news articles or

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _in social media

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: of using text data to predict some other real world variables.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _But in this case

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: the historical stock price data would be very important for this prediction.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: And so that's an example of non-text data that would be very

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: useful for the prediction.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: And we're going to combine both kinds of data to make the prediction.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: Now non-text data can be also used for analyzing text by supplying context.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _When we look at the text data alone

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: we'll be mostly looking at the content and/or opinions expressed in the text.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: But text data generally also has context associated.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _For example
column6: the time and the location that associated are with the text data. _

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: And these are useful context information.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: And the context can provide interesting angles for analyzing text data.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _For example
column6: we might partition text data into different time periods _

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: because of the availability of the time.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: Now we can analyze text data in each time period and then make a comparison.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: Similarly we can partition text data based on locations or

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: any meta data that's associated to form interesting comparisons in areas.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _So

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: interesting angles or perspectives for text data analysis.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: And it can help us make context-sensitive

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: analysis of content or the language usage or

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: the opinions about the observer or the authors of text data.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: We could analyze the sentiment in different contexts.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: So this is a fairly general landscape of the topics in text mining and analytics.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: In this course we're going to selectively cover some of those topics.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: We actually hope to cover most of these general topics.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: First we're going to cover natural language processing very

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: briefly because this has to do with understanding text data and

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: this determines how we can represent text data for text mining.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _Second
column6: we're going to talk about how to mine word associations from text data. _

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: And word associations is a form of use for lexical knowledge about a language.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _Third
column6: we're going to talk about topic mining and analysis. _

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: _And this is only one way to analyze content of text

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: it's a very useful ways of analyzing content.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: It's also one of the most useful techniques in text mining.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: Then we're going to talk about opinion mining and sentiment analysis.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: So this can be regarded as one example of mining knowledge about the observer.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: And finally we're going to cover text-based prediction

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: problems where we try to predict some real world variable based on text data.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: So this slide also serves as a road map for this course.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: And we're going to use this as an outline for

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: the topics that we'll cover in the rest of this course.

name: 2 - 2 - 1.2 Overview Text Mining and Analytics- Part 2 (00-11-44).srt
text: [MUSIC]
